entries.group_harvest_bonus_masterranger: You have received a bonus to harvesting because you were in a group with a Master Ranger nearby!
entries.group_harvest_bonus_ranger: You have received a bonus to harvesting because you were in a group with a Ranger nearby!
entries.group_harvest_bonus: You have received a bonus to harvesting because you were in a group!
entries.need_space_expansion: You cannot acquire that skill until you register the space expansion, 'Star Wars Galaxies: Jump to Lightspeed'.
entries.being_milked: That creature is already being milked.
entries.milk_success: You have successfully gathered milk from the creature!
entries.milk_continue: You continue to milk the creature.
entries.milk_too_far: The creature has moved too far away to continue milking it.
entries.milk_begin: You relax the creature and begin to milk it.
entries.milk_not_hidden: The creature is spooked and won't let you milk it.
entries.milk_cant: That creature is dry of milk.  You can't milk it.
entries.notify_stalked: It seems that you are being stalked by %TO.
entries.sys_scan_combat: Your attempt to gather information has been disrupted by combat!
entries.sys_scan_moved: Your attempt to gather information has been disrupted by moving around too much.
entries.sys_scan_inside: Your tracking skills only apply to outdoor environments.
entries.sys_scan_already: You are already searching for information.
entries.sys_scan_begin: You begin to examine the environment for information.
entries.sys_scan_nothing: You aren't able to determine anything from the tracks in the area.
entries.scan_results_d: You have examined the tracks and clues in the area for information about what kinds of creatures might be nearby.  This is what you have determined.
entries.scan_type_d: Select the type of entity you want to search the area for.
entries.sys_conceal_delay: You must wait %DI seconds to mask your scent again.
entries.sys_conceal_apply: You carefully apply the camouflage to %TT.
entries.sys_scentmask_concealed: You can't mask your scent while you are concealed.
entries.sys_conceal_notplayer: You can only conceal yourself or another player.
entries.sys_conceal_scentmasked: You can't Conceal while Scent Masked.
entries.sys_conceal_remove: You remove the camouflage.  You are no longer concealed.
entries.sys_conceal_nokit: You need to have a Camouflage Kit in your inventory to Conceal.
entries.group_conserve: You only harvest a portion of the resources, leaving some behind for your groupmates.
entries.sys_scentmask_delay: You must wait %DI seconds to mask your scent again.
entries.sys_conceal_noskill: You don't have the proper skill required to conceal yourself.
entries.sys_conceal_cant: You can't conceal yourself in your current posture.
entries.sys_conceal_othersclose: You can't conceal yourself because you are too close to a potentially hostile creature or NPC.
entries.sys_conceal_stop: You are no longer concealed from view.
entries.sys_conceal_start: You are now concealed from view by complex camouflage.
entries.sys_scentmask_success: Due to your scent mask, a %TT ignores you.
entries.sys_forage_inside: You can't forage inside a structure.
entries.nothing_to_harvest: The creature did not have any intact harvestable resources.
entries.creature_quality_scrawny: You harvested %DI unit(s) of %TU.  The creature was skinny.
entries.creature_quality_skinny: You harvested %DI unit(s) of %TU.  The creature was scrawny and unhealthy.
entries.creature_quality_medium: You harvested %DI unit(s) of %TU.  The creature was of medium size.
entries.creature_quality_fat: You harvested %DI unit(s) of %TU.  The creature was fat and healthy.
entries.sys_scentmask_already: You are already masking your scent.
entries.sys_scentmask_break: A creature has detected you, despite your attempts at camouflage!
entries.sys_scentmask_fail: You cannot mask your scent now.
entries.sys_scentmask_stop: Your masked scent has worn off.
entries.sys_scentmask_start: Your natural scent has been masked from creatures.
entries.sys_scentmask_noskill: You might be a very clean person, but you lack the skill to mask your scent from creatures.
entries.sys_forage_noroom: Some foraged items were discarded, because your inventory is full.
entries.sys_forage_noskill: You lack the skill to forage.
entries.sys_forage_combatfail: Combat distracts you from your foraging attempt.
entries.sys_forage_movefail: You fail to forage because you moved.
entries.sys_forage_attrib: You need to rest before you can forage again.
entries.sys_forage_fail: You failed to find anything worth foraging.
entries.sys_forage_empty: There is nothing in this area to forage.
entries.sys_forage_success: Your attempt at foraging was a success!
entries.sys_forage_start: You begin to search the area for goods.
